name: Fix My Car: Classic Muscle LT
name_original: Fix My Car: Classic Muscle LT
description:
Have you ever wanted to fix-up a car? Complete one classic car while attending to over 30 odd-jobs by discovering parts, solving car issues, and using objects you find throughout the garage to fix your car. This game combines the Room Escape and Hidden Objects styles into one great app. You'll find it really entertaining even if you don't know a thing about cars.

This version is the free / LITE version of the app. It lets you partially complete the car. To complete the car you will need to watch reward ads or upgrade to the FULL version of the game.

As for your game progress, the game will auto-save your every move so you can always undo a step or take a break.

Please do not spoil the fun for others by posting puzzle solutions in the comments. Instead, come and find us (FireRabbit) on Facebook.
